name: troll-union
headline: Trolling for Tariffs
article: Amid rising tensions between local merchants and the bridge-troll union, faction official Moh'rgen Mork'hol has threatened to lock down bridges along several strategic trade routes in an effort to raise minimum toll rates for union members. Refusing of these tolls may lead to a strike.

outcomes.customDescription: The well funded trolls increase trade in town...

quest.name: troll-union-quest
quest.title: Bust the Troll Strike
quest.description: We will NOT back down to the troll union's demands!

completedEvent.name: troll-union-completed
completedEvent.headline: Troll Strike Busted!
completedEvent.article: Following the picket-busting crackdown on Moh'rgen Mork'hol's union headquarters, bridge-trolls across the land have backed down on their outrageous demands for a 4 day workweek and paid sick leave.

name: goblins
headline: Chanting Camps Causes Chaos
article: Some goblins were spotted nearby the town, and residents have been kept up all night by horrid sounds of some rhythmic ritual they seem to be performing. We might be able to work outs what's going on in there, or just ignore them and hope it goes away.

quest.name: goblins-quest
quest.title: Investigate Goblin Camp
quest.description: We need to put a stop to whatever going with that chanting

completedEvent.name: goblins-completed
completedEvent.headline: Goblin Festival Busted!
completedEvent.article: Our scouts to report that the ritualistic chants were just an experimental music festival. After our narcs were discovered, the goblins have disbanded due to their "harshed vibes, bro" to take their horrible music elsewhere.

outcomes.customDescription: The distracting chanting continues for a few days, but they eventually move on for now...

name: kidnapping
headline: A Raider's Ransom
article: Two adventurers have been kidnapped by raiders while scouting! We've received a ransom note stabbed to a watchtower. Do we pay for their return, or hunt down these raiders?

quest.name: kidnapping-quest
quest.title: Recover the Kidnapped Adventurers
quest.description: Raiders have kidnapped our adventurers, we need to rescue them!

completedEvent.name: kidnapping-completed
completedEvent.headline: Rescue Raiders
completedEvent.article: Our adventuring party has returned successfully, recovering our kidnapped adventurers, and destroying the raiders camp.

outcomes.customDescription: The 2 kidnapped adventurers have also returned
They realise you're a pushover, but return your adventurers, for now...

name: woodland-creatures
headline: Princess Out for Revenge
article: A captured princess, tired of waiting for rescue, broke free, befriended nearby woodland creatures, and trained them into a deadly army. Now, she's out for revenge against the town for forgetting about her. GuildCo. correspondent reports "We think her ransom note got caught in our spam filter."

quest.name: woodland-creatures-quest
quest.title: Defeat the Escaped Princess
quest.description: The princesses' army of woodland creatures must be stopped

completedEvent.name: woodland-creatures-completed
completedEvent.headline: Princess Re-captured
completedEvent.article: The recaptured princess is now awaiting trial for raising a bloodthirsty militia of furry friends. Speculation indicates that she'll be locked up in 'The Tower', an asylum for runaway princesses.

name: dryad-commune
headline: Dryad Commune Definitely a Real Threat
article: A group of nature loving dryads have formed a commune near our industrious town. Rumour has it they have terrible mind controlling powers, spreading troublesome ideas like 'equality', and 'not burning the very world we live in'. Their very existence is a threat to us!

quest.name: dryad-commune-quest
quest.title: Organise a Coup
quest.description: Bring 'peace and order' to these dangerous dryads

completedEvent.name: dryad-commune-completed
completedEvent.headline: Dryad Commune Burned Down
completedEvent.article: Evidence strongly supports those hippy dryads were going to destroy our way of life any day now.

name: sentient-campsites
headline: Mimics Hidden in Camp
article: We've heard of some mimics closing in on our town, they seem to be setting up a campsite nearby. Knowing mimics, they could be hiding anywhere in the camp, so we must tread carefully.

quest.name: sentient-campsites-quest
quest.title: Uncover the Mimics
quest.description: Investigate these camps and find the mimics hiding within

completedEvent.name: sentient-campsites-completed
completedEvent.headline: Sentient Campsites
completedEvent.article: Our adventurers barely made it out of the mimic camps, as they were investigating the content of a tent, teeth appeared around the opening, trapping the adventurer in the tent's maw. It was only the quick reflexes of a fellow adventurer poking at it with a stick that freed them to fight another day.

name: kobolds
headline: Kobold Mining Camp Spotted
article: Kobolds have taken over a nearby mine, and were seen nibbling on the minerals. They were then chased back to town while the kobolds yelled at them to get off their property.

quest.name: kobolds-quest
quest.title: Clear Out Mining Camp
quest.description: Take back the mine from these vicious kobolds

completedEvent.name: kobolds-completed
completedEvent.headline: This Mine is MINE!
completedEvent.article: The adventurers sabotaged the kobold operations, and have taken the mine back! As celebration the victorious party has converted the kobolds crude explosives into fireworks and are hosting a celebration.

name: undead
headline: Necromaniac!
article: A maniacal necromancer has started raising the dead outside our town. Time for us to start smashing some skeletons!

quest.name: undead-quest
quest.title: Stop the Undead Horde
quest.description: Take back the mine from these vicious kobolds

completedEvent.name: undead-completed
completedEvent.headline: Necromancer Actually Pretty Cool
completedEvent.article: After smashing their way through the skeleton army, our adventurers confronted the necromancer, who was just hanging out with his new undead friends. After spending time chatting, the necromancer agreed to return the dead to their rest if they could come hang out in the town.

outcomes.customDescription: The necromancer joins your town. +1 Arcanist (<sprite=4>)

name: hivemind
headline: Neighbourly Defense
article: Another settlement needs our help! Word has come in that a nearby friendly camp is in trouble, and if we could lend a few of our adventurers "that'd be tops" they said in unison. Something about them is off, so we best be careful and only send our most expendable adventurers.

quest.name: hivemind-quest
quest.title: Investigate the 'Friendly' Settlement
quest.description: Something is off about these friendly folk...

completedEvent.name: hivemind-completed
completedEvent.headline: Hysterical Hivemind
completedEvent.article: Our adventurers return from a distress call to a nearby settlement. Unfortunately, the camp was already completely taken over by a hivemind that spread from a nearby elder-brain. "We got there and everything was fine until we realised everyone was speaking in unison." At least the adventurers burnt down the town before any of them could escape, although the trip home was full of shifty eyes, and accusatory 'jinxes'.

name: vikings
headline: Viking Rager
article: Some vikings have set up shop nearby, and are hosting a massive party. I hear these things go wild, we should totally go.

quest.name: vikings-quest
quest.title: Party With the Vikings
quest.description: The vikings are hosting a rager, we should swing by before it gets too out of hand

completedEvent.name: vikings-completed
completedEvent.headline: A Berserking Good Time
completedEvent.article: Our adventurers have returned from their visit to the viking party. It was a great time, but around half-way through all the vikings took a strange shot, started foaming at the mouth, and all started blindly fighting each other. Our group decided to leave after it was clear they'd all knock themselves out.

outcomes.customDescription: Truly a rager of a time...

name: raiders
headline: Strike Back!
article: Raiders have started setting up camps a little too close for our comfort. If we don't raid them first, who knows what they might do?

quest.name: raiders-quest
quest.title: Raid the Raiders
quest.description: We need to get them first!

completedEvent.name: raiders-completed
completedEvent.headline: Raiding the Raiders!
completedEvent.article: Our adventurers return successful from taking down a nearby bandit camp. They claim to have found "totally real evidence they were just about to attack us", so the complete destruction of their camp was justified, and no further questions will be taken.

outcomes.customDescription: If we take gold from them, that doesn't make us the raiders, right?
